```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,include=FALSE}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(survey)
dt <- readRDS("C:/Users/bikra/OneDrive - The University of Memphis/Geospatial modelling/Datasets/Processed data/Cleaned_datasetV1.RDS")
# create survey design
svydt<-svydesign(ids = ~ids, strata = ~strata, nest = T,weights = ~Sampling_wt, data=dt)
```

### Characteristics of Study participants

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

svydt |> 
  tbl_svysummary(by = "Year", include = c("Province","Ecological_region","Place_of_residence", "Wealth_quintile","agemonths", "Sex", "Mother_education", "husband_edu", "minimumDV", "household_food_security"),
                 digits = all_categorical()~c(0,1))
```

```{r}

tab.fun1(dataset = dt, multinomlist =c("Combined", "OUTCOME2"), by = "Year" )
```
